A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: THE WORST STAR WARS MOVIE I'VE SEEN! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS! With a bad plot\, useless subplots\, underdeveloped characters\, bad acting\, and characters making painfully stupid choices\, this movie was unbearable to watch. It went against everything that has been established so far and is only somewhat bearable if you know absolutely nothing about star wars.
